p: S. suffruticosa collected from Zahedan showed the highest antimicrobial activity against some gram-positive bacterial strains. Against gram-negative bacteria, polar and nonpolar extracts exhibited a mild inhibitory activity, in comparison with positive control (Mottaghipisheh et al., 2017 ▶; Masoudi Shiva et al., 2005 ▶; Masoudi Sh et al., 2011 ▶). Overall, S. suffruticosa extracts did not show significant antibacterial potentials.
